title: igorpauer
author: igorpauer
content: Blochain and cryptocurrencies save lives. After the outbreak of war in Ukraine, payment cards were blocked. Ukrainian people switched en masse to cryptocurrencies. Some other digital services were moved to different blockchains or smart contracts on various platforms.

comments.body: Yes, I think crypto is a save heaven for people who can't use banks or live in poor countries with high inflation. That's why people in Africa try to adopt crypto ASAP.

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: crypticj on February 02, 2023, 05:39:29 AMYes, I think crypto is a save heaven for people who can't use banks or live in poor countries with high inflation. That's why people in Africa try to adopt crypto ASAP.I don't know about the news that Ukrainians switched to crypto after the war, but what is happening in Africa, especially Nigeria. Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are trending here, and it helps many people as their Naira currency is depreciating more and more due to government mismanagement. Bitcoin is not a paradise but it is the best solution right now for those who are struggling there. I am not from Nigeria, but my life has also improved a lot from bitcoin, it can be said that my economy is stable thanks to bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.
